name: Outreach to John
description:
Hi John,

I am father of an MAS patient. I have recently put my NFT project online to fund for my daughter's medical expense and a local MAS organization. But since I am nobody, my project is not noticed at all.

The project site is http://mas-awareness.top and my twitter is https://x.com/Ric_Li_C.

Please support by getting NFT at 0.09 BNB each or just spreading the word to let more people know.

Thank you for your time.
